Procedure.name: ohObjectSave
Procedure.description: Serialize list of objects to given path, return count of objects serialized

Parameter.name: ObjectList
Parameter.description: list of objects to be serialized

Parameter.name: Path
Parameter.description: file to which objects are to be serialized

Parameter.name: ForceOverwrite
Parameter.description: overwrite the output file if it exists

Procedure.name: ohObjectLoad
Procedure.description: Deserialize list of objects from given path, return count of objects deserialized

Parameter.name: Path
Parameter.description: file from which objects are to be deserialized

Parameter.name: OverwriteExisting
Parameter.description: Overwrite any existing Object that has the same ID as one being loaded
